General.Name: Jiangsu Zijin Rural Commercial Bank Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Zijin Rural Commercial Bank Co.,Ltd provides various banking products and services to personal and business customers. The company offers deposits; loans; foreign currency deposits, international settlement, trade finance, and treasury services; and financial industry and investment banking services. It also offers debit and credit cards; and mobile and Internet banking services, as well as ATMs. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: No. 381 Jiangdong Middle Road, Nanjing, China
